channel.title: "Coding Client"
channel.description: Hi, I need to know how to make it so when I right click an item/object/npc/etc. that it shows up in the pop-up. This works on the MoparScape client, but I need it on my current one.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 07:37:25 am[/size]
